citrus.citrus greening: Remove infected branches and apply copper fungicide.
citrus.root rot: Ensure good drainage and apply fungicide.

tomato.powdery mildew: Use sulfur spray at first sign.

lettuce.downy mildew: Provide adequate air flow and apply fungicide.
lettuce.lettuce drop: Rotate crops and remove infected plants.

strawberry.powdery mildew: Apply sulfur spray or use resistant varieties.
strawberry.botrytis: Remove infected berries and ensure good airflow.

spinach.downy mildew: Water early to allow leaves to dry.
spinach.leaf spot: Remove affected leaves and improve spacing.

basil.downy mildew: Ensure good airflow and avoid overhead watering.
basil.fusarium wilt: Use disease-free seed and remove infected plants.

cucumber.powdery mildew: Apply sulfur spray and ensure adequate spacing.
cucumber.bacterial wilt: Remove infected plants and control beetles.

pepper.bacterial spot: Remove infected leaves and improve air circulation.

arugula.downy mildew: Ensure good air circulation and avoid overhead watering.
arugula.leaf spot: Remove affected leaves and avoid excess moisture.

blueberry.mummy berry: Remove mummified fruit and apply fungicide early.
blueberry.botrytis: Prune for airflow and remove infected berries.
